title: Next Time, Barry Keoghan Wants to Play the Joker for More Than Four Minutes
description: The Irish actor and star of the new movie "The Banshees of Inisherin" spoke to Newsweek about his future in "The Batman" movies as the Joker.
content:
Barry Keoghan got just a taste of playing the infamous comic book character the Joker in the movie The Batman, but now he wants more.
The young Irish actor has had a stellar 2022, with a surprise appearance in the DC Comics movie, followed up by an e... [4289 chars]
